<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the extra computation cost makes it less interesting in general cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO - If we want to chain more than two instructions, we need to create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// artifical edges to make dependencies from the FirstSU also dependent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on other chained instructions, and other chained instructions also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependent on the dependencies of the SecondSU, to prevent them from being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduled into these chained instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aed7cc99dc980dadd92d30eb5046710f6">hasLessThanNumFused</a>(FirstSU, 2) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Currently we only support chaining together two instructions&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the latency between both instrs.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getSUnit() == &amp;SecondSU)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.setLatency(0);</span></CodeLine>
